column1: This extension adds massaction column and allows you to mass delete templates and copy with desired prefix and suffix.
column2: This extension adds massaction column and allows you to mass delete templates and copy with desired prefix and suffix.

column1: This action will make 1:1 copy of selected e-mail templates with provided prefix and suffix in template name (code). Are you sure?
column2: This action will make 1:1 copy of selected e-mail templates with provided prefix and suffix in template name (code). Are you sure?

column1: Provide text which will be added to template code from the left side.
column2: Provide text which will be added to template code from the left side.

column1: Provide text which will be added to template code from the right side.
column2: Provide text which will be added to template code from the right side.

column1: Selected template(s) will be deleted permanently! Are you sure?
column2: Selected template(s) will be deleted permanently! Are you sure?
